name: Double Jump Doodler
description:
Designer
Chris Kissler

Class/Semester
Game Design Technologies M102, Spring 2017

Engine
GameMaker Studio

Genre
Puzzle Platformer

Description
Double Jump Doodler is a 2D Puzzle Platformer with some precision platforming elements.  It has a whimsical aesthetic and uses intuitive mechanics to guide the player through a challenging yet satisfying gaming experience.

http://mcgamedesign.com/
